comment_text: Ay caramba, Lisa, you are such a complete dork! Stop posting stuff like this, people will think being a nerd runs in our genes!
I'm always telling people 'the boy has no sense', and you're always proving me right!
Homie, for the love of God, please finish up in the bathroom and come help Bart with his homework.
Goo goo ga ga, mama! *Ferocious binky sounds*
Maggie, I am going to visit your lovely parents tonight to try and convince them that baptizing you is the only way to guarantee your eventual salvation!
Ned, we're all in support of kindness, community and positivity, but could you do it without being so preachy?
Mrs. Flanders, I can't have you continuing to haunt me from the spirit world, I beg you to please rest in peace.
I followed your lead and you gave me a pay *decrease*! D'oh!
Smithers, your unwavering loyalty to Mr. Burns is both admirable and a bit puzzling. You must really enjoy fetching his slippers!
*Dead silence, arms crossed, binky completely still*
Hey neighborino! Keep letting the Lord sing his song through you, and might I suggest you join the church orchestra!
Coming from a ghost, I hope you listen carefully when I tell you to right your ways and repent before you join me down here.
Simpson, it is only by a clerical error from Smithers that your pink slip wasn't processed before your contract renewed. Tread lightly, or I will release the hounds.
Mrs. Simpson, I need to get your advice one day on obtaining a relationship and committment from someone who doesn't value you fully.
I keep forgetting that Homer has three kids and not two, but that's probably because you're not old enough to be in my viewership demographics! Ha!
Bart could really use a father figure with your moral compass.
Please stop haunting me, Mrs. Flanders! It's Ned you should haunt! Or your kids... whatever their names are.
It's a shame you have no heir apparent, cause you'll be long gone before my kids enter the workforce and I had hoped they would carry on the family tradition of working for a Burns.
Smithers, your unwavering loyalty to Mr. Burns is both commendable and a little disturbing. But hey, everyone needs a sidekick!
Goo goo ga ga, boo! *Stares intensely, then rolls eyes*
